dcterms:description: Banking77-OOS consists of 13,083 customer service queries, categorized into 77 fine-grained intents within the online banking domain. Among these, 50 intents are in-scope, while the remaining 27 are out-of-scope queries.
dcterms:title: Banking77-OOS

dcterms:description: CLINC-OOS consists of two domains: 'Banking' and 'Credit cards', each featuring 10 in-scope and 5 out-of-scope intents. The training sets for each domain include 500 in-scope queries, while the test sets contain 850 queries, with 350 designated as out-of-scope instances.
dcterms:title: CLINC-OOS

dcterms:description: CLINC-Banking is a subset of CLINC-OOS, focusing on the banking domain with specific intents for customer queries.
dcterms:title: CLINC-Banking

dcterms:description: CLINC-Credit_Cards is a subset of CLINC-OOS, focusing on credit card-related intents for customer queries.
dcterms:title: CLINC-Credit_Cards
